oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Street in Noyon mined by Germans

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; Mine warfare; Mines (Warfare); Explosives; War damage; Soldiers; Debris
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The ruins of a street in Noyon as a result of mine warfare. Two French soldiers in the foreground appear to be looking at something on the ground. Two men are clearing debris in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Karl Kleeman World War I Photographs
